MetaData.Description: Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

y_p_conc_max_root.description: root maximum P conc. !assume P conc in roots non-varying

y_p_conc_max_oil.description: oil maximum P conc. ! no oil in pigeonpea

Model.phase_names: sowing germination emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe end_crop
Model.phase_type: sowing emergent inductive photo photo photo photo fixed fixed fixed waiting
Model.composite_phases: under_ground above_ground grainfill reproductive leaf_senescence vernalisation emergence2floral_initiation preflowering node_formation start_grain_fill2harvest_ripe hi_stress_sensitive stress_reporting n_stress
Model.above_ground: emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe
Model.node_formation: emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill
Model.n_stress: emergence end_of_juvenile floral_initiation flowering start_grain_fill end_grain_fill maturity harvest_ripe

pesw_germ.description: plant extractable soil water in seedling layer inadequate for germination (mm/mm)

shoot_lag.description: Time lag before linear coleoptile growth starts (deg days)

shoot_rate.description: Growing deg day increase with depth for coleoptile (deg day/mm depth)

rel_emerg_rate.description: Stress factor for thermal time calculation between germination and emergence

twilight.description: Twilight is defined as the interval between sunrise or sunset and the time when the true

x_lai_ratio.description: ratio table for critical leaf size below which leaf number is reduced ()

stem_trans_frac.description: fraction of stem used in translocation to grain - not used for i_wheat option

leaf_trans_frac.description: fraction of leaf used in translocation to grain

pod_trans_frac.description: fraction of podwall used in translocation to grain

meal_trans_frac.description: fraction of meal used in translocation to grain

oil_trans_frac.description: fraction of oil used in translocation to grain

root_trans_frac.description: fraction of oil used in translocation to grain

frac_leaf.description: fraction of remaining dm allocated to leaves

frac_pod.description: fraction of dm allocated to pod or multiplier of grain dm to account for pod dm

y_sla_max.description: maximum specific leaf area for delta LAI

sla_min.description: minimum specific leaf area for delta LAI

y_ws_root_fac.description: effect of supply_demand_ratio on root depth increase

x_sw_ratio.description: water availability for effects on root depth growth

y_sw_fac_root.description: stress factor for root depth growth, This may be probably the same for all crops

eo_crop_factor_default.description: default crop factor for limiting soil

y_swdef_pheno.description: stress index for phenology_modified by Yash Chauhan

y_swdef_pheno_flowering.description: stress index for flowering phenology_modified by Yash Chauhan

y_swdef_pheno_start_grain_fill.description: ! stress index for grainfilling phenology_modified by Yash Chauhan

oxdef_photo_rtfr.description: fraction of roots waterlogged for effect on photosynthesis

N_fix_rate.description: modified by YSC as appreciable N fixation occurs by floral initiation but none may befound at end_gf.

x_sw_avail_fix.description: soil water ratio for effect on N fixation

N_fact_photo.description: multipler for N deficit effect on photosynthesis

N_fact_expansion.description: multipler for N deficit effect on leaf expansion

N_fact_pheno.description: multipler for N deficit effect on phenology

N_fact_grain.description: multipler for N deficit effect on grain

root_die_back_fr.description: fraction of roots lost at harvest

min_tpla.description: lower limit of total plant leaf area

node_sen_rate.description: rate of node senescence on main stem

fr_lf_sen_rate.description: fraction of total leaf number senescing per main stem node

n_fact_lf_sen_rate.description: max relative increase in leaf senescence due to N stress

sen_light_slope.description: sensitivity of leaf area senescence to shading

x_temp_senescence.description: minimum temperature for frost senescence table (oC)

y_senescence_fac.description: daily fraction of leaf area senesced due to frost (0-1)

sen_rate_water.description: slope in linear eqn relating soil water stress during photosynthesis to leaf senesence rate

root_dead_detach_frac.description: fraction detached from each part of a dead plant per day.

root_sen_detach_frac.description: fraction of senesced plant part detached each day from live plants

leaf_no_crit.description: critical number of leaves, below which portion of the crop may die due to water stress

tt_emerg_limit.description: maximum degree days allowed for emergence to take place

days_germ_limit.description: maximum days allowed after sowing for germination to take place (days)

swdf_photo_limit.description: critical cumulative photosynthesis water stress, above which the crop partly fails (unitless)

swdf_photo_rate.description: rate of plant reduction with photosynthesis water stress

swdf_pheno_limit.description: critical cumulative phenology water stress, above which the crop fails (unitless)

kl_ub.description: upper limit of water uptake factor

tt_emergence.description: TT from emergence to end of juvenile phase

est_days_emerg_to_init.description: estimated days from emergence to floral init.

y_tt_end_of_juvenile.description: TT from end juvenile to floral initiation

y_tt_flowering.description: TT from flowering to start grain fill

tt_maturity.description: TT from maturity to harvest ripe

tt_emergence.description: TT from emergence to end of juvenile phase

est_days_emerg_to_init.description: estimated days from emergence to floral init.

y_tt_end_of_juvenile.description: TT from end juvenile to floral initiation

y_tt_flowering.description: TT from flowering to start grain fill
